WorkItem.Description:
It might be usefull to have external language files which contain the translation for the interface, like menu, filters,....
With this kind of files, some users could participate and give you the correct translation to have a multilanguage software.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request] Translation files for Foreign Languages

Comments.Message: Indeed, we'd love to do this at some point. It's not something that can happen very quickly, but we're working on it.
Henry Ford says: You can get Rawr in any language you want as long as it's english. :-)

Since I have such a small part in the development, I could go through and try to get a list going to be translated. In that list I could make an initial translation of everything (Google translation is good up to a point).
Not yet Hina. There's a lot we need to do under the hood to prepare for that, and a ton of text will change between then and now.
In a first step it would be fine to switch the Items to another language
Now the  source code is hardly to Translation . Many place in the souce direct use english in logic code.
I have no idea what that says.

I will adding the Itemdatabase also with translating. Its very simple possible.

The wowhead, buffed, speedydragon has api's to get the original English Name and a translated Name for all items. In Rawr addin a switch to change the Language and after Reset the Cache, use the translated Name as Itemname and only for Items without translated Name use the Original Name.

The same for Gems and Enchanded (Same way).

Another Methode are, Change the Item cache und add a new Field for translated Name. and use it to display it as name in the Window. And in the next Step addind Multilanguage Support in the Tool.

The Curseforge has a nice Implemention about Multilanguage support. In the Webfrontend you can setup a Multilanguagefile and fill it out with all Translation. After this Step, you can Add Any Languages and other Users can help you in the translation. After Release Submit, Curseforget write all Languages in sourcefiles. This can be now Downloaded. This way can help you in Deployment.
